self_predictions.prediction_summary: Denis feels he is at 70% now and hopes to be at 75% by the match day. He is concerned about John's endurance and ability to attack his hand and wrist.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Denis plans to focus on top roll and pronation control rather than his old hook style.

John Brzenk.strength: Dangerous, can shock the arm wrestling world
John Brzenk.previous_match_summary: Lost to Irakli but showed strength in wrist control

Denis Cyplenkov.strength: 70% now, hopes to be 75% by match day
Denis Cyplenkov.health: Feeling better after adjusting to Dubai
Denis Cyplenkov.previous_match_summary: Last match was in 2018 against Devon Larratt

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon Larratt is expected to win due to changes in his training camp and preparation system, making him much stronger.

Devon Larratt.strength: Improved significantly due to changes in training
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Different from years before, now much stronger

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon Larratt has better endurance and is expected to win, though Ongarbaev is disciplined and has a chance if he starts well.

Kydyrgali Ongarbaev.strength: Disciplined and can show many styles

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Levan is heavily favored due to his size and strength, but Ermes has a chance if he can control the wrist.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Levan's size and weight make it difficult for Ermes to change angles.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Extremely strong due to his size (approximately 200 kg)

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Strong wrist moments and top-level control
